text: Leonard Hayflick (May 20, 1928 - August 1, 2024) was an American biologist and professor. He discovered the Hayflick limit and Cell culturing. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Hayflick died in Sea Ranch, California on August 1, 2024, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2024 deaths Category:University of California faculty Category:American biologists Category:Educators from Philadelphia Category:Scientists from Philadelphia Category:American academics
title: Leonard Hayflick
